trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging> event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項負責的分頁作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewPageEventArgs object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate whether the paging operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewPageEventArgs 物件會傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，並指出是否應取消的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the paging operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the DetailsViewPageEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消的分頁作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>DetailsViewPageEventArgs 物件屬性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewPageEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 DetailsViewPageEventArgs 類別的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>|The value of the `newPageIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>|值`newPageIndex`參數。 | > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式時引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the new page to display.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示新的頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the new page to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在新的頁面索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging> event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control performs the paging operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A> property of the control contains the index of the previously displayed page and cannot be used to determine the index of the page selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>之前就會發生事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>分頁作業，控制項執行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>控制項的屬性包含先前顯示的頁面的索引，而且無法用來判斷使用者所選頁面的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: Use the NewPageIndex property to determine the page index.
trans-unit.target: 用於 NewPageIndex 屬性判斷頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically override the page index selected by the user by setting it to another value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性，若要以程式設計方式覆寫使用者所選取設定為另一個值的頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the new page to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示在新的頁面索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。
